Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
BSKL Fun Run 2013, 'The Car Park Chase'.
It's time to have some fun with your fitness and raise some money for charity. The craze of vertical running has come to BSKL, from B3 all the way up the car ramps to the main door AND, back down again! How fast can you do it?
We don't just need runners though, we also need volunteers to help on race day, please read on.
Put the date in your diary: Sunday March 10
10am start, (registration from 9am - 9.30am) NO ENTRIES WILL BE ACCEPTED ON THE DAY.
There are two categories of racing, Individual and Team, and you can enter both.
The Individual Race is open to all pupils from Year 1 to Year 8, to BSKL parents and teachers.
The Team Race is open to all pupils from Year 1 to Year 8, to BSKL parents and teachers.
INDIVIDUAL RACE: Runners will race from B3 up the car ramps to the roundabout at the main door and run back down again. Runners will be racing in groups of 8-10 runners to ease congestion.
TEAM RACE: Teams should consist of 3 runners, each runner will run up one level of the car park, tag their team member and when the time comes, run back down again.
The three runners should come from the same band of Year Groups, see below:
Band A: Years 1 and 2 Band B: Years 3 and 4 Band C: Years 5 and 6 Band D: Years 7 and 8 Band E: Parents and Teachers
ENTRANCE FEE: Individual Race: 20 MR per adult, 10 MR per child.
Team Race: 50 MR per Band E Team, 30 MR for all other teams.
Proceeds from the race will go to the BSKL EFC Charities.
There will be prizes for the first three runners in each Year Group Band and in the individual race.
All runners who finish will receive a medal and goodie bag!
To have a successful race day we need volunteers. We need mums and dads and teachers willing to be Timekeepers and Race Marshals, to point runners in the right direction, to ensure it is a success. Volunteers will receive a special t-shirt as we all know, you can't run a race with runners alone!
To register your interest in participating in the BSKL Fun Run 2013, The Car Park Chase, please email lynfenby@hotmail.com
LIKE, LIKE, LIKE: You can also keep up to date on all the news about this fun event by going to our facebook page: BSKL Fun Run 2013: The Car Park Chase.
NO RACE ENTRIES WILL BE ACCEPTED ON THE DAY.
